body: Blanca, I have been able to run E+ simulations with Meteonorm data without a problem.  I just ran an E+ model with a meteonorm file for Antarctica. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*k9pHGBCHskwY9Ujw3*FRE61gpfxhweLKiablYVud8-0LWisSvHd6aQ-tEUiB45ZbtsBfUe2Xssf6Tnu-LJkgKMyz7pUfV3G/EPInAntarctica.PNG) My guess is that your energy model is failing because of how you have set up your HBZones (or for some reason other than the weather file).  I would recommend starting a new discussion if this seems to be the case and you are not able to run your simulation with non-Meteonorm files as well. -Chris
